description: My internet connection is very slow and buffering constantly.
solution: Check your router lights. If all green, try restarting the router. If red light blinks, there is a line fault.

description: I have no signal bars on my phone.
solution: Try toggling Airplane mode on and off. If that fails, check if you are in a coverage area or if the SIM card is properly seated.

description: My bill is higher than expected this month.
solution: Check your detailed bill usage. You might have exceeded your data cap or made international calls. Contact billing support for a breakdown.

description: How do I activate international roaming?
solution: You can activate roaming via the mobile app under 'Services' or text 'ROAM' to 121.

description: My calls keep dropping after a few minutes.
solution: This might be due to network congestion or a faulty SIM. Try restarting your phone. If it persists, we may need to replace your SIM.
